'''0.0.21a_01'''<ref>{{ytl|X4yxFrnbXTk|MineCraft house tour|Chantaru413|June 26, 2009}}</ref><ref>https://oi194.photobucket.com/albums/z61/ninjachuck385/cavern3.png</ref><ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DrkcrYoxl3Y</ref><ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R-RicZjBaXk</ref><ref>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Xv4XU9D4DY</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 23, 2009, at 16:17 UTC to try to fix a "hang bug" by adding a max iterations to the clipping.<ref name=0.0.21a_01 /><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''A11:17:11 <08Notch> client 0.0.21a_01 is up, fixing the hang bug''" (16:17:11 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Attempted to fix a "hang bug" by adding a max iterations to the clipping.<ref name=0.0.21a_01>[[wordofnotch:128808577|"Is the hang bug fixed in 0.0.21a_01?"]] – The Word of Notch, June 23, 2009</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''A11:40:57 <08Notch> the only difference between 0.0.21a and _01 is that I added a max iterations on the clipping''" (16:40:57 UTC)</ref>
** However, the game still hangs. As the problem made worse, performance is now much lower than in previous versions.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''A11:24:10 <08Notch> so it still hangs? :-O [...] A11:24:14 <akuryo> yeah notch''"  (16:24 UTC)</ref>
